Package dstm2.exceptions

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AbortedException
    Thrown by an attempt to open a TMObject to indicate that the current transaction cannot commit.
    GracefulException
    Thrown by the BaseContentionManager when the benchmark time has elapsed.
    PanicException
    Thrown to indicate an error in the use of the transactional memory; that is, a violation of the assumptions of use.
    SnapshotException
    Thrown if shapshot validation fails.
